item.title: Romance Scams Proliferate Domain Registrations Ahead of Valentine’s Day
item.description: Analysis of 3280+ suspicious 'love/dating' domains registered before Valentine's Day for romance scams, crypto fraud, and dating app credential harvesting.

item.title: BforeAI Named by Gartner® for Predictive Threat Intelligence Use Cases in Preemptive Cyber Defense
item.description: The Gartner report identifies BforeAI for its Predictive Attack Intelligence service that "proactively alerts users to digital threats and orchestrates infrastructure takedowns."

item.title: Malicious Infrastructure Campaigns: How Unrest in Iran is Being Weaponized Online
item.description: PreCrime Labs analyzes a surge of Iran-themed domain registrations weaponizing unrest for fraud, sanctions evasion, and conflict. Get preemptive security indicators.

item.title: When Attackers Build Better Products Than Startups
item.description: Some cyber attackers build phishing campaigns with product-level UX, so polished they’d outperform many legitimate startups if used for good.

item.title: Threat Advisory: Scam Activity Leveraging U.S. Actions in Venezuela in January 2026
item.description: Threat advisory on scam campaigns exploiting U.S. actions in Venezuela, with malicious domains targeting merchandise, crypto, energy, and real estate.

item.title: What the f**k is a CAO and do I need one?
item.description: The CAO (Chief Automation Officer) is the "Chief Enabler." The role assesses automation feasibility, ensuring the right solution (deterministic vs. agentic) for business problems.

item.title: Threat Research Advisory: Mass Fake-Shop Campaign Targeting Retail Customers
item.description: PreCrime Labs' 2025 advisory details a mass fake-shop campaign leveraging 244 domains, Chinese infrastructure, and retail brand mimicry to facilitate fraud and malware.

item.title: BforeAI Named ‘Tech Innovator in Preemptive Cybersecurity’ by Gartner®
item.description: The Gartner report identifies BforeAI for its Predictive Attack Intelligence service that "proactively alerts users to digital threats and orchestrates infrastructure takedowns."

item.title: PreCrime Guarantee
item.description: BforeAI is partnering with Munich Re to provide our customers with ten times the peace of mind.

item.title: Harnessing Predictive Threat Intelligence for Robust Operational Technology Security
item.description: Predictive Threat Intelligence (PTI) shifts OT security from reactive to preemptive, using AI/ML to predict cyber threats weeks in advance by observing infrastructure behavior, leading to disruption, deterrence, and quantifiable ROI.
